org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Serial Version Clean Up: Could not calculate id for class 'test1.E1$3'

Looks like a regression from bug 139381. Benno please investigate whether this was an intermittent problem on the build machine or a real bug. Might be a timing or "different VM" issue.

Created an attachment (id=40462)
fix

This is a problem with the test. For the CleanUpTest a compiler compliance of 5.0 is used. The test fails because the SerialVersionComputer VM can't load 5.0 classes. Fix is to set the compiler compliance level to 1.4. for this test, which also works when running the tests with a 1.5 VM. The quality of the build is not affected.
This is in the tests. Please go ahead and release.
Verified - no more test failures in N20060510-0010.
